short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protect your eyes from blue light with a customizable warm overlay

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EyeShield is your go-to solution for protecting your eyes from the harmful effects of blue light. This innovative extension provides a customizable warm overlay, reducing eye strain and enhancing your browsing comfort.

Features at a Glance
Blue Light Protection: Effectively filters blue light to safeguard your eyes during prolonged screen use.
Customizable Overlay: Adjust the warmth and intensity of the overlay to suit your preferences.
User-Friendly Interface: Designed with simplicity in mind, making it easy to use for everyone.
